title: Realms of Chaos fans needed (regarding music CD release)
content:
Hey folks,

Nothing to be announced just yet, but I've been working on a Realms of Chaos 2-CD set for a while now (disc one, original soundtrack, disc two, remixes).

While the music side is pretty much taken care of (although if anyone's interested in working with it, *let me know ASAP*), I do request the following if anyone can help out:

- An artist (hell, just someone who can edit images creatively), basically anyone who could produce good front and back cover art for ROC (back cover needs to be simple and include space for track titles)
- Someone who can give a good track list for the music (the default ripped order is stupid)


So, I don't need much, I have the musicians and the webpage coder. I just need an artist and someone who's familiar with ROC generally for ideas.

Anyone with anything sundry to contribute is welcome to do so, including any questions or comments.

I can also say this isn't a pipe dream, without wishing to say too much, disc one was completed tonight.

Regards,
- Spikehttp://smc.sq7.org - Sierra Music Central - for old Sierra soundtracks (hopefully Apogee too!)
